ICP Description: E-commerce brands selling heavy or bulky items (furniture, fitness equipment) that struggle with high shipping costs and damaged goods.
Subscription box companies for perishable goods (food, plants) requiring fast shipping and careful handling.
Sustainable fashion brands that need eco-friendly packaging and carbon-neutral shipping options to match their brand values.

A US-headquartered D2C/eCommerce brand (Shopify Plus/BigCommerce) doing M–M GMV, 1k-15k orders/mo. Outgrown in-house/low-touch 3PL. Faced with delays, mis-picks, inflexible ops. Needs Prime-like CX, real-time visibility, dedicated AM, kitting/assembly.

Non-US D2C brand (UK/EU/MENA/APAC) with growing US demand (500–10k orders/mo). Ships cross-border but losing conversion due to delivery times/costs/returns. Needs US warehouse for local experience without building own team.
